name: smashingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in an extremely good, attractive, enjoyable, or pleasant way: The exhibition, with 60 works overall, is smashingly good. The sales certainly appear to be going smashingly.
More examplesFewer examplesI see we'll get along smashingly.If it wasn’t for this, they would have had a smashingly huge world record.The show is still doing smashingly, with productions touring all over the country.He says they are getting on very well and things are going absolutely smashingly.
